snippet.title: King of Retail - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
King of Retail is available in Early Access: https://store.steampowered.com/app/968250/King_of_Retail/
Dive into a new career as the owner of your very own store! Plan and design your building. Buy and sell customisable goods. Hire and manage staff, take care of customers and plan the perfect marketing campaign. Become the most popular store in town. But watch out, the devil is in the details..

Stay up to date with King of Retail and Iceberg Interactive: 

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/kingofretail/
https://www.facebook.com/iceberginteractive

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/King_of_Retail
http://twitter.com/Iceberg_Int

Discord: https://discord.com/invite/fckN6bE
Official website: https://www.kingofretail.com
Steam publisher page: http://bit.ly/IcebergOnSteam
